hits.book_ref: CWWN, vol. 19, "Notes on Scriptural Messages (3)," ch. 6: The Rapture and the Tribulation  (1)
hits.snippet: Among those who believe that the whole church will go through the tribulation and then be raptured are George Müller, A. J. Gordon, A. B. Simpson, Dr. Erdman, Professor [503] Moorhead, H. W. Frost, Robert Cameron, James Wright, B. W. Newton, and others.
